name: webvr-feature-detector
description: lightweight feature detector and microloader for webvr
author: pete markiewicz

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean -s && mkdirp dist/js && mkdirp dist/img mkdirp dist/css && mkdirp dist/models
scripts.build:detector: copyfiles -f src/index.html dist && stripify src/webvr-feature-detector.js > src/bundle.js && browserify -t -d src/bundle.js -d -p [minifyify . --drop_console . --compressPath . --map webvr-feature-detector.js.map --output dist/js/webvr-feature-detector.js.map] > dist/js/webvr-feature-detector.js && copyfiles -f src/pngfallback.js dist/js
scripts.build:debug: copyfiles -f src/index.html dist && copyfiles -f src/webvr-feature-detector.js -d -p [minifyify . --drop_console . --compressPath . --map webvr-feature-detector.js.map --output dist/js/webvr-feature-detector.js.map] > dist/js/webvr-feature-detector.js && copyfiles -f src/pngfallback.js dist/js
scripts.build:debugfull: copyfiles -f src/index.html dist && copyfiles -f src/webvr-feature-detector.js dist/js && copyfiles -f src/pngfallback.js dist/js
scripts.build:polyfills: copyfiles -f node_modules/webvr-polyfill/build/webvr-polyfill.js node_modules/whatwg-fetch/fetch.js node_modules/html5shiv/dist/html5shiv.min.js node_modules/promise-polyfill/Promise.min.js node_modules/js-polyfills/es5.js node_modules/js-polyfills/dom.js node_modules/js-polyfills/typedarray.js node_modules/ie8/build/ie8.js node_modules/custom-event-polyfill/custom-event-polyfill.js node_modules/gamepad-plus/dist/gamepads.js dist/js/polyfills
scripts.build:exhtml: copyfiles -f src/example.html dist/ && copyfiles -f src/webvr-dom-ui.js dist/js && copyfiles -f src/styles.css dist/css/
scripts.build:assets: copyfiles -f assets/icons/* dist/img/icons/ && copyfiles -f assets/images/* dist/img/ && copyfiles -f assets/models/* dist/models/ && copyfiles -f assets/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:html && npm run build:detector
scripts.build:example: npm run build:exhtml && npm run build:assets && npm run build:detector && npm run build:polyfills && npm run build:three
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:three && npm run build:dist && npm run build:example
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
